jde.wizards
Class Signature

java.lang.Object
  jde.wizards.Signature

public class Signature
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a method signature.

Version:
$Revision: 1.11 $
Author:
Eric D. Friedman

Constructor Detail

Signature

public Signature(java.lang.reflect.Method meth,
                 ClassRegistry aregistry)
Creates a signature for the specified method and register its types with the specified registry (which may be null). Removes package info from generated signatures.

Parameters:
meth - Method represented by this signature
aregistry - Registry containing this signature

Signature

public Signature(java.lang.reflect.Method meth,
                 ClassRegistry aregistry,
                 boolean truncate)
Creates a signature for the specified method and register its types with the specified registry (which may be null).

Parameters:
meth - Method represented by thi signature
aregistry - Registry containing this signature
truncate - toggles removal of package info from generated signatures

Signature

public Signature(java.lang.reflect.Method meth,
                 ClassRegistry aregistry,
                 boolean truncate,
                 boolean see)
Creates a signature for the specified method and register its types with the specified registry (which may be null).

Parameters:
meth - Method represented by thi signature
aregistry - Registry containing this signature
truncate - toggles removal of package info from generated signatures
see - Class to link the see section to or null, if no see section should be created

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object compare)
Tests whether a given object equals this signature. The object is considered equal if it is a signature and it has the same method name and parameter list.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
compare - Test object
Returns:
true if the test object equals this signature.

getMethod

public java.lang.reflect.Method getMethod()
Gets the method of which this is a signature.

Returns:
Method of which this is a signature.

baseName

public final java.lang.String baseName(java.lang.Class type)
Computes the basename of the specified class. This returns "Object" from "java.lang.Object." It returns the "single" form of an Array object. In the case of inner classes, the base name includes the outer class name, e.g., mypackage.OuterClass$InnerClass is returned as OuterClass.InnerClass

Parameters:
type - Class whose basename is required
Returns:
basename

getExceptionList

public final java.lang.String getExceptionList()
Make a list of this method's exceptions separated by commata.

Returns:
Exceptions thrown by this method.

Parameters:
except - Array of exception types
Returns:
Comma-separated list of exceptions

te parameter names seperated by comma.

getParameterNames

public final java.lang.String getParameterNames(java.lang.Class[] params)
Gets a list of parameter names for this method; parameters are named by the NameFactory whose default implementation uses param1 .. paramn. Class type names are not included in the result Contributed by Charles Hart

Parameters:
params - Parameters of this method
Returns:
Parameter list in string form

getModifiers

public final java.lang.String getModifiers()
Gets list of modifiers for this method. Interface methods are always public and may be synchronized

Returns:
a String containing a list of modifiers
